review: Have used ours everyday for the year we've had it. If you have any Apple products, the AirPlay integration should push this product ahead of the competition. If you don't own Apple products, then it may be more of a toss up. Ours is probably 50% a Netflix player. If you use Amazon Instant Video, that iOS app streams pretty seamlessly to this little box. Apple auto-updates the OS regularly. That may not be the case with other boxes.Two notes:* HDMI & Optical audio only. If you don't have a modern HDTV, this box won't work.* the (young) kids **love** the PhotoStream screensaver. It's insanely easy to set up a special PhotoStream from all your family iOS devices to feed the screen saver daily. Then when ever you snap a pic, a few taps from anywhere and when you get home, the photo's already mixed in.

review: I have a apple tv that is a few years old and it works like new, but outputs only 720p HD which looks great on my 42 inch Vizio flatscreen TV.  It does everything very well, and it mirrors well from my Apple tablets and phones.  I took a star off the rating because it does not support Amazon streaming. Also, most of the channels it gets are useless unless you subscribe to each one. This is true also for Roku and other TV streaming boxes.

review: I got this Apple TV at my local Target. The Apple TV is a great purchase for a household that uses all iPads and iPhones. We are able to stream anything and mirror our iPads and iPhones. This is great for watching movies that you have on an iPad, looking at vacation photos that you took on your phone, or even using the built in apps.
author: SahilTheGreat

review: I'm tired of having to reactivate abc shows.  Every couple of weeks I have to go online to reactivate my account to watch shows that come from ABC.  An the activation process from ABC doesn't work half the time.  It may not be Apples fault but it makes me hate my Apple TV to have to go through all these hoops.  There is nothing much of a selection unless you subscribe to premimum cable, hulu plus, or netflix.
